title: Aatrox is binary and unfun to play against...but Tryndamere is okay?
body:
ALL Tryndamere does is Auto attack. Its his entire kit. His kits synergizes with items that let him do way more damage than Aatrox, heal a lot, and then press R to not die. Yeah, so much FUN to play against right?

How come he doesn't get deleted, but Aatrox does? 

Riot, your shit bias disgusts me.

replies.body: Aatrox didn't get changed for being binary, he got changed from not working for years.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkinPrime,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4XjzHlPr,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2018-06-29T04:43:25.644+0000)
>
> he worked fine.

That is why his win rate was piss poor as was his play rate in all elos and tourney play right?
I said he worked fine. Does fine mean great? Maybe learn to read first before you respond. Fine means, he is fine, MANY other champions are not seeing  in tourney play. So what?

> [{quoted}](name=DarkinPrime,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4XjzHlPr,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2018-06-29T15:39:22.050+0000)
>
> I said he worked fine. Does fine mean great? Maybe learn to read first before you respond. Fine means, he is fine, MANY other champions are not seeing  in tourney play. So what?

Yeah, but until recently, he saw no play in standard play as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4XjzHlPr,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-29T04:16:49.083+0000)
>
> Aatrox didn't get changed for being binary, he got changed from not working for years.

Actually he got changed for being completely overpowered when even remotely viable. His extreme sustain was incredibly toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Malpercio,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4XjzHlPr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-06-29T04:28:53.932+0000)
>
> Actually he got changed for being completely overpowered when even remotely viable. His extreme sustain was incredibly toxic.

So never, I don't remember Aatrox seeing ANY play until recently.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Malpercio,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4XjzHlPr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-06-29T04:28:53.932+0000)
>
> Actually he got changed for being completely overpowered when even remotely viable. His extreme sustain was incredibly toxic.

Riot even said drain tank style is hard to balance out the numbers. They either become too strong through their sustain when they are buffed, or they turn into the feast or famish when nerfed. Thatâ€™s why they changed Swain because it was quite the conquest trying to balance out the numbers.

Please. Ive seen olafs and tryndameres out sustain him.  Stop with the fucking talking points. Build randuins, pick nasus, him with hard CC, burst him down, a million ways to deal with his sustain WHICH HE ONLY GETS WHEN AUTO ATTACKING. 

ANY fed champion can steam roll the enemy. Aatrox didn't have a monopoly on this. Yeah, its not toxic for an ahead Yi to 2 shot your carry? Get the fuck out of here with your nonsense.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkinPrime,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4XjzHlPr,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-06-29T04:41:03.952+0000)
>
> Please. Ive seen olafs and tryndameres out sustain him.  Stop with the fucking talking points. Build randuins, pick nasus, him with hard CC, burst him down, a million ways to deal with his sustain WHICH HE ONLY GETS WHEN AUTO ATTACKING. 
> 
> ANY fed champion can steam roll the enemy. Aatrox didn't have a monopoly on this. Yeah, its not toxic for an ahead Yi to 2 shot your carry? Get the fuck out of here with your nonsense.

I really can't see how either of them would out sustain him unless they built almost purely lifesteal. I'd often heal for 300-500 every like, 2 AAs with Guinsoo's and Death's Dance. Yeah, he's gotta auto attack, but so do they...

I think you're just being hostile to be hostile. When Aatrox was released, he didn't need to be fed to steamroll. He literally just ignored the existence of his enemy and freefarmed, or if they actually tried to fight them, won any trade they made with ease. There were very good reasons as to why Aatrox was nerfed into oblivion.
They've already said he's getting a rework im pretty sure.

> [{quoted}](name=TheDevice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4XjzHlPr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-06-29T04:30:52.019+0000)
>
> They've already said he's getting a rework im pretty sure.

I haven't seen anything on that. Might you have a source?
And that's why Tryndamere will eventually get a VGU aswell.

Yeah he's a big stat check.  Only counterplay to him late game is to not come close to him or outstat him.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Uh, really? So, building randuins, taking exhaust, picking Nasus, Malph etc,  picking a strong poke champion, hitting him with hard CC folllowed by burst...none of that worked? 

Because it does. You are just peddling talking points you have heard over the years. You didn't come to these conclusions on your own.

I always shut down Aatrox when I had to lane against him. Its not hard.

>Uh, really? So, building randuins, taking exhaust, picking Nasus, Malph etc, picking a strong poke champion, hitting him with hard CC folllowed by burst...none of that worked?

No it doesn't work, have you seen pro play? Is literally a suicide to pick a tank against old Aatrox because he will just drain tank them and ignore the armor with Conqueror, the only one used is Ornn because pre 6 can contest him but that's all. 

Cry all you want, your bullshit old champ was cancer and I'm glad that is gone.
So if he was such BS why wasnt his win rate higher? HMM?

not just {{champion:23}}
 but most notiably {{champion:11}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:157}} just to name a few, you need BrainDead Faceroll Melee Auto Attack champions in the game for those that are bad at life, no skill involved, simply AClick and AFK.
